summary: Manages the complete training lifecycle for DreamBooth fine‑tuning on Megatron‑scale models, including model provisioning, data preparation, forward and backward computation, optimizer handling, checkpoint loading, and adapter integration with parallel gradient support.
business_intent: Provides enterprises a scalable solution to customize large generative models for personalized image generation, reducing development effort and accelerating deployment of fine‑tuned DreamBooth models.
